```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
zs
library(leaflet)
library(shiny)
sliderInput('n', 'Number of markers', min = 1, max = 100, value = 30, step = 1)
renderLeaflet({
  n = input$n
  df = data.frame(lat = rnorm(n, 42), lng = rnorm(n, -93))
  leaflet(df) %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers()
})
```

``` {r}

leaflet(data = beats) %>%
  addProviderTiles("Stamen.Toner") %>%
  addPolygons(
    weight = 1,
    fillOpacity = .1
  ) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(
    data = SF2017FINAL,
    color = "red",
    weight = 0,
    radius = 2,
    fillOpacity = .5,
    label = ~htmlEscape(paste0(NUMBER," ", STREET))
  )


```
